name: Slabo 13px
description: Slabo is a collection of size-specific fonts for use in online advertising and other web uses. The collection currently includes this font, Slabo 13px, and Slabo 27px . Each font in the collection is fine-tuned for use at the pixel size in its name. The Slabo project is led by Tiro Typeworks, a type design foundry based in Canada. To contribute, see Slabo on GitHub.
author: John Hudson
